original_text: Each one who crosses over to those already counted is to give a half shekel, according to the sanctuary shekel, which weighs twenty gerahs. This half shekel is an offering to the Lord.
korean_text: 무릇 계수 중에 드는 자마다 성소의 세겔로 반 세겔을 낼지니 한 세겔은 이십 게라라 그 반 세겔을 여호와께 드릴지며

sentences.original_text: Each one who crosses over to those already counted
sentences.korean_translation: 이미 계수된 자들에게 건너가는 각 사람은

sentences.original_text: is to give a half shekel
This half shekel is an offering
